contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|Ephrem}} '''Ephrem''' is a given name that may also be spelled Efrem or Ephraem. Ephrem may refer to: {{TOCright}} ==People== ===First name=== *[[Ephrem the Syrian]] (306-373), Syrian saint *[[Efrem Emerson]], American writer *[[Efrem Forni]] (1889-1976), Italian priest *[[Efrem Hill]] (born 1983), American football player *[[Efrem Kurtz]] (1900-1995), Russian conductor *[[Ephrem Mbom]] (born 1954), Cameroonian football player *[[Ephrem Mtsire]] (died 1101), Georgian monk *[[Efrem Shultz]] (born 1975), American musician *[[Efrem Zimbalist]] (1890-1985), Russian-born American violinist *[[Efrem Zimbalist Jr.]] (born 1918), American actor *[[Saint Ephrem of Crimea]] ===Surname=== *[[Georgios Efrem]] (born 1989), Cypriot football player *[[Mérovée Ephrem]] (born 1990), French figure skater *[[Sebhat Ephrem]] (born 1951), Eritrean general and politician ==See also== *[[Ephraim (disambiguation)]] {{given name}}
